decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): B-01 REV D (LOCATION AND BLOCK PLAN); A-01 REV D (EXISTING AND PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR); A-02 REV D (EXISTING AND PROPOSED ROOF); A-03 REV D (EXISTING AND PROPOSED ELEVATION AND SECTION); A-04 REV D (PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR AND ROOF); A-05 REV D (PROPOSED FRONT AND REAR ELEVATIONS AND SECTION); A-06 REV D (PROPOSED WEST AND EAST SIDE ELEVATIONS)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and the Ealing Local Plan 2024 (Reg 19).

| The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with Policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), Policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding (following demolition of existing outbuilding)
